SEARCH
Package com.example.tundra_snow_app

Class Users

java.lang.Object
com.example.tundra_snow_app.Models.Users
Direct Known Subclasses:
Organizers
public class Users extends Object
Represents a user of the application. It encapsulates details such as the user's unique ID, first name, last name, email, password, profile picture, date of birth, phone number, notification settings, device ID, location, roles, and permissions.

  • Constructor Details

    • Users

      public Users()
      No-argument constructor (required by Firestore).

    • Users

      public Users(String userID, String firstName, String lastName, String email, String password, String profilePicUrl, Date dateOfBirth, String phoneNumber, boolean notificationsEnabled, String deviceID, String location, List<String> roles, List<String> facilityList)
      Constructor for the Users class. Initializes the user's properties.
      Parameters:
      userID - Unique user ID
      firstName - First name of the user
      lastName - Last name of the user
      email - Email of the user
      password - Password of the user
      profilePicUrl - URL of the user's profile picture
      dateOfBirth - Date of birth of the user
      phoneNumber - Phone number of the user
      notificationsEnabled - Flag to indicate if notifications are enabled
      deviceID - Device ID of the user
      location - Geolocation of the user
      roles - List of roles assigned to the user
      facilityList - List of facilities the organizer manages
